snippet: About 150 prisoners escaped Thursday after they forced their way out from Tanjung Gusta Prison in Medan, the capital of North Sumatra Province.
abstract: About 200 inmates, including terrorists, escape crowded prison in western Indonesia that is still burning one day after prisoners riot and set fires; at least 55 escapees have been captured.
lead_paragraph: About 150 prisoners escaped Thursday after they forced their way out from Tanjung Gusta Prison in Medan, the capital of North Sumatra Province.
